Room.Name: Granary
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the large granary facility for the town of Kista.
Room.LongDescription: The granary is a storage facility for grains and rices. Since the forests around Kista are not capable of producing grains, they are often imported from towns such as Brownhaven where corn and wheat almost grow naturally. This facility stores these grains as supply lines are not very reliable and caravans might not arrive for as long as six months at a time.
